body:
Hey everyone,

So this past few months I have been gathering particular textures from different packs to create a compilation. Here is some pictures:
http://imgur.com/a/esTZA

If you could give feedback, it would be appreciated.
body_tagged:

title: Sneak Peek (Resource Pack)

replies.body:
looks kewl so far. :)

Although, i just do not like swords to be red :C not my type of thing lol

When the full version is out I am certainly using it!

replies.body:
Nice particles, I really like the cartoonish/hand-drawn style of them. The swords look pretty nice as well, and the bow is really smooth.

Reduced fire is okay, I prefer it to be a bit more noticeable, and I really don't like the lava texture. However, that's just personal preference.

Nice pack so far!
replies.body_tagged:
Nice particles, I really like the cartoonish/hand-drawn style of them. The swords look pretty nice as well, and the bow is really smooth.

Reduced fire is okay, I prefer it to be a bit more noticeable, and I really don't like the lava texture. However, that's just personal preference.

Nice pack so far!
